Posts.Content: Hi everyone.  I just got the results from my biopsy today. The doctor said what no one wants to hear, "it's cancer" To complicate things I'm 12 almost 13 weeks pregnant.  I have horrible anxiety as it is and I don't know how to stay calm, this doesn't feel real! I know a mastectomy is probably next but my first planning appointment is Friday. One very long day away.  I would love to have others to talk to. I don't know what stage, if it's spread or anything yet...
Posts.Title: Pregnant and just received the news
